## Government Tender Announcement: Blading Services for West Block Roads – Grasslands National Park

### Reference Number: cb-452-25311846

**Title: Blading Services West Block Roads – Grasslands National Park**

#### Description

The Parks Canada Agency is seeking the services of a motor grader and operator to provide blading services for the West Block roads within Grasslands National Park. The scope of work includes:

* Blading and shaping roadways
* Redistributing gravel across the road surface
* Routine maintenance to provide a smooth, safe, and defect-free riding surface, eliminate hazards to vehicular traffic, promote drainage, and protect the road asset

### Request for Proposal (RFP)

A Request for Proposal (RFP) is issued for the provision of blading services for the West Block roads. Bidders are expected to submit their proposals electronically to **soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca**. Faxed or hard-copy submissions will not be accepted.

### Important Notes

* The minimum email file size that Parks Canada can receive is 15 megabytes.
* Bid documents must be sent as email attachments; emails with links to bid documents will not be accepted.
* Bidders are responsible for any issues related to the transmission or receipt of emailed bids due to file size or other technical issues.
* Late submissions will not be considered.

### Period of Contract and Delivery Date

The contract period is from the contract start date to March 31, 2025. The option to extend the contract by up to two additional one-year periods (April 1, 2025 to March 31, 2026, and April 1, 2026 to March 31, 2027) is also available.

### Contact Information

For technical and contractual inquiries, please submit your questions in writing to the Contracting Authority **mandelle.waddell@pc.gc.ca** or 1-866-246-6893.

### Notice of Amendment (if applicable)

Addenda, when issued, will be available from the Government Electronic Tendering Service at http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities.

**Official Documentation**

Please refer to the official documents on the Government of Canada tendering service website at http://canadabuys.canada.ca/en/tender-opportunities for further information.
